 Partitions a point cloud into sub points clouds.

Detailed Description

Abstract interface for spatial partition of point clouds.

This interface allows to partition a point cloud into several point cloud with the help of an Octree. Each leaf cell of the octree forms a partition.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void brics_3d::IOctreePartition::partitionPointCloud ( PointCloud3D *  pointCloud,
std::vector< PointCloud3D * > *  pointCloudCells 
) [pure virtual]

Partitions a point cloud into sub points clouds.

The behavior of the subdivision can be influenced with the parameter voxel size: IOctreeSetup::setVoxelSize()

Parameters:
[in]pointCloudThe input point cloud that will be partitioned. This data will not be modified.
[out]pointCloudCellsResulting vector of point clouds. Each point cloud represents one cell of the partition.

Implemented in brics_3d::Octree.
